name: Brutal Tendency
description:
Made for the <5 Minutes of Play jam on GameJolt in 2015 on May 30th.

"Brutal Tendency is a text game that introduces you to a difficult question right off the bat which effects the strange storyline as you play. It's up to you to fit the pieces together and find your destiny, whatever it may be."

This game has not been changed since it's original release.

You can find it mirrored here.
